member.name: P:JetBrains.ReSharper.TestFramework.BaseTestWithSolution.GuardAffinity
member.summary: How the main test method should be executed.

member.name: T:JetBrains.ReSharper.TestFramework.BaseTestWithSolution.GuardAffinityFlags
member.summary: How the main test method should be executed.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.TestFramework.BaseTestWithSolution.GuardAffinityFlags.GuardedAndSync
member.summary: The test method is executed under guard. Async behavior prohibited.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.TestFramework.BaseTestWithSolution.GuardAffinityFlags.UnguardedAndAsync
member.summary: The test method is executed without an external guard. Async behavior is allowed for the test run.

member.name: T:JetBrains.ReSharper.TestFramework.CaretMovement
member.summary: Helper class for testing navigation actions. Mimics movements of the caret from a source to a destination point

member.name: P:JetBrains.ReSharper.TestFramework.NamedPositionsProcessor.SkipExtensions
member.summary: List of file extensions to skip text processing. Usefull for binary files.

member.name: T:JetBrains.ReSharper.TestFramework.CaretPositionsProcessor
member.summary: Helper class for testing navigation actions. Extracts information about caret movements from test data file. The encoding of caret movement is as follows: {sourceN} - source point for Nth movement {targetN} - target point for Nth movement
